com.example.tabbedversion.HelperClasses

Interface IssuesHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    issues_logic

    public interface IssuesHelper
    The Interface IssuesHelper will assist both the Issues pages for both normal users and Alliance head This Interface is to be implemented in the Issues pages

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getIssue(android.widget.TextView t)
      This method should send a GET request to the server, requesting the user's issue
      void sendOptionToServer(android.widget.CheckBox A, android.widget.CheckBox B, android.widget.CheckBox C, android.widget.EditText issueid, android.widget.TextView Ans, android.widget.TextView issue)
      This method should check which check box is selected and send the users selected option to the server using a POST request

    • Method Detail

      • sendOptionToServer

        void sendOptionToServer(android.widget.CheckBox A,
                        android.widget.CheckBox B,
                        android.widget.CheckBox C,
                        android.widget.EditText issueid,
                        android.widget.TextView Ans,
                        android.widget.TextView issue)
        This method should check which check box is selected and send the users selected option to the server using a POST request
        Parameters:
        A - Checkbox for the selected option yes
        B - Checkbox for the selected option no
        C - CheckBox for the selected option none
        issueid - issue being resolved
        Ans - TextView box that displays what happens once the option is selected
        issue - TextView box that displays any errors

      • getIssue

        void getIssue(android.widget.TextView t)
        This method should send a GET request to the server, requesting the user's issue
        Parameters:
        t - The TextView that is used to display the issue
